# 1. Set up

```{r set-up}
# libraries
# general use
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

# analysis
library(lme4)
library(DHARMa)
library(glmmTMB)

# model prediction visualizations
library(ggeffects)


# data
height_all <- read_csv("final_height.csv") %>% 
  separate_wider_delim(specimen_id, delim = "-", names = c("date", "site", "individual", "specimen"), cols_remove = FALSE) %>% 
  unite("individual_id", date:individual, remove = TRUE, sep = "-")

perimeter_all <- read_csv("final_perimeter.csv") %>% 
  separate_wider_delim(specimen_id, delim = "-", names = c("date", "site", "individual", "specimen"), cols_remove = FALSE) %>% 
  unite("individual_id", date:individual, remove = TRUE, sep = "-")

```
